name: Offshoot (Ludum Dare 34)
description:
Your limbs are made of guns. At the end of each level, you have to sacrifice one of your weapons.

Sacrifices will be made

The aim of the game:
Destroy all of the enemies
Reach the red flag in the level 

Controls:
A and D = Left and right movement
U = Shoot right arm weapon
I = Shoot left arm weapon
O = Shoot right leg weapon
P = Shoot left leg weapon
Space Bar = Jump
